CustomField.formula: Approved_Advance_Amount_Total__c - ( Origination_Fee_Total__c + Advance_Fee_Total__c + IF ( Appraisal_Fee_Netted__c , BPO_Appraisal_Fee_Total__c,0) + IF ( Report_Fees_Netted__c , Report_Fee_Total__c ,0) + Doc_Prep_Fee_Total__c + BlackSquare_Fee_Total__c + Daily_Interest_Rate_Total__c + Inspection_Fee_Total__c + Wire_Fee_Total__c + Servicing_Fee_Total__c + Other_Fee_Total__c + Application_Fee_Total__c )
CustomField.label: Net Funding Total
